name: VolaTiles
description:
VolaTiles is a mix of two genres. Sokoban meets Mine Sweeper. 

You play as an Astronaut. The mission is to deliver boxes to energy sockets.

While boxes can charge the engine through sockets, they are extremely exposed to volitile energy fields under the tiles. Avoid pushing boxes over those dangerous tiles!  

...otherwise, the ship'll go BOOM!

Controls: 

WASD - Movement

R - To restart the level

O - Mark the tile

Esc - Pause 

Devs:

Music & Sound Design by Mike Byrne

Art by Alexandra Aheieva

Game Design and Programming by Alexander "Prayslock" Lomonosov
